title: Seriously? Permabanned for this?
body:
Well I am kind of surprised only a couple people knew I was trolling. This is actually an old friends account who I use to talk too in skype, and he was always toxic whenever he didn't win. I do actually think some people need help on here guys so please don't post that they deserved to be banned. Go over why they were banned in the first place. Sorry for flooding this forum with one thread lol I just wanted to get a reaction. Oh also If I said anything rude to you I didn't mean it I promise. I'm also not really gonna be replying to anything else on here. What was the point of this? Nothing. I am Toster21 on NA if you still don't believe me I have commented on this thread.

Game 1
Ki11eraA: lol fukin noob riven
Ki11eraA: yeah fuck you riven
Ki11eraA: liss f
Ki11eraA: niec flash fukin noob %%%%%% ebola kid go killyouraself fukin smelling %%%%%%
Ki11eraA: good try %%%gots
Ki11eraA: stfu %%%ot thersh
Ki11eraA: fukin noob %%%%%%s
Ki11eraA: noobs
Ki11eraA: l2p
Ki11eraA: so bad
Ki11eraA: go afk plz
Ki11eraA: stfu %%%%%%r
Ki11eraA: i will kill your family and gonna rape them
Ki11eraA: idc fukin %%%%%%s
Ki11eraA: so bad
Ki11eraA: stfu fukin noob %%%%%%r
Ki11eraA: worst riven iv ever ee
Ki11eraA: so nooob
Ki11eraA: gj fukin noobs feed my lane
Ki11eraA: sure
Ki11eraA: im proud of tsunami killed your family fukin asian kid kindred
Ki11eraA: hhahah stfu fukin %%%%%%ss
Ki11eraA: houpso you all die on ebola or aids fukin smelling %%%%%%rs

Kids need to know they're bad like REALLY. Since Riot is just being a bunch of assholes, and ban me for no reason I'm not even gonna bother creating a new account.

replies.body: These types of posts concern me. I want to think it's just a shitpost.. but the possibility that there might actually be people like this.. It scares me.
The hell are you on? I didn't ask you to shitpost on my thread. Enjoy your upvote farm, and btw your username tilts the shit out of me.

> The hell are you on?

Currently high as all living fuck on adenosine triphosphate. Shits good, keeps my cells going all day.

>  I didn't ask you to shitpost on my thread.

Who exactly where you asking with this post then?

> Enjoy your upvote farm,

I don't try to get upvotes, they just happen when I speak my mind

> btw your username tilts the shit out of me.

Working as intended.

Oh haha drugs you're so funny! If you're not even gonna contribute to this thread stay the hell out of it. The majority of the people on Players Behavior & Moderation just do nothing, but downvote and comment shit like "Stay banned lel". I mean look at what you even said in the beginning. You're clearly not gonna help with the problem, and just keep saying your jokes. I actually wanted help on this thread. Not fucking stand-up comedy.

Do you even know what adenosine triphosphate is?

The fact that you post this thread in all seriousness means you're beyond help.

> Ki11eraA: niec flash fukin noob %%%%%% ebola kid go killyouraself fukin smelling %%%%%%
>Ki11eraA: i will kill your family and gonna rape them
>Ki11eraA: im proud of tsunami killed your family fukin asian kid kindred
>Ki11eraA: houpso you all die on ebola or aids fukin smelling %%%%%%rs

You honestly, with all your effort and human brainpower, 100% cannot figure out why this isn't acceptable behavior? You actually don't understand how this is bad?

Like I said, nobody can help you. Just like most of the people who come here with radioactive chatlogs wondering why they got banned whilst they vomit forth excuses.

I don't know if you've ever worked at a real job, but good luck if you ever manage to get one. You'll need it.

Oh, I'm sorry for not knowing adenosine triphosphate was. I'm very sure everyone else knew what that was here too. People keep bringing up my fucking personal life to this shit, and think irl I'm a toxic little fat kid who does nothing, but play League all day. I don't know why you're comparing this game to a real job, but clearly you're serious, and I still will never know how you just compared those two things, but whatever floats your fucking boat. I'll let you know if they ever ask about my Match History on LoL.

Well, if it looks like a duck, smells like a duck, and quacks like a duck...
And if you really don't understand why I made that comparison, you are genuinely beyond help short of a paid professional. 

I'll try to make this really clear and simple for you one last time

You.
Are.
A.
Gigantic.
Asshole.

**Your** behavior is an absolute disgrace to civilized human beings and the fact that you even entertain the thought of justifying it shows just show sick and delusional your mind is. 

If you act like a petulant child, you will be treated like a petulant child. It's really not any more complicated than that.
What's there to contribute...you were EXTREAMLY toxic and 100% deserve this after you blatantly ignored your chat restricts and game bans, enjoy being gone.
toxic little kid calm down
.. you mean... you don't see the problem with this...
You _are_ joking, right?

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nfEOEHiN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-27T22:31:26.323+0000)
>
> You _are_ joking, right?

I really, really hope so...
No, I'm not gonna be a little fun warrior that says "Come on guys we can do this!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!". It's bullshit that I was permabanned for this.

Here's just one little quote that goes away from pointing out someone's mistakes...

"i will kill your family and gonna rape them"

That sounds somewhat ban worthy to me.
Being toxic doesn't lose games like what the fuck does that even mean. It's people who don't even look at their mistakes, and continue to feed like the god fucking damn red cross.

> [{quoted}](name=Ki11eraA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nfEOEHiN,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2016-06-27T22:36:49.396+0000)
>
> Being toxic doesn't lose games like what the fuck does that even mean. It's people who don't even look at their mistakes, and continue to feed like the god fucking damn red cross.

ye.. stay banned .
That's your backup? "ye.. stay banned lol ." Give me a real fucking reason.

> [{quoted}](name=Ki11eraA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nfEOEHiN,comment-id=000100010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-27T22:39:35.255+0000)
>
> That's your backup? "ye.. stay banned lol ." Give me a real fucking reason.

Are you having trouble in real like with just... life in general.
Oh fuck off with that bullshit. Everything was fine until Riots brainwashed slaves perma'd me.

> [{quoted}](name=Ki11eraA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nfEOEHiN,comment-id=00010001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-27T22:41:41.825+0000)
>
> Oh fuck off with that bullshit. Everything was fine until Riots brainwashed slaves perma'd me.

X_X Leave your house... go outside make some friends X_X
What even brought up life? Wait you did. You act like you know me through comments. I expect you to comment back with "yea very clearly"

> [{quoted}](name=Ki11eraA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nfEOEHiN,comment-id=0001000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-27T22:46:40.725+0000)
>
> What even brought up life? Wait you did. You act like you know me through comments. I expect you to comment back with "yea very clearly"

X_X Go outside, meet some friends. X_X
I think you and I know perfectly well we don't know anything about each other. Telling me to go outsides, and meet friends has fucking nothing at all to do with this thread.

> [{quoted}](name=Ki11eraA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nfEOEHiN,comment-id=000100010000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-27T23:04:29.356+0000)
>
> I think you and I know perfectly well we don't know anything about each other. Telling me to go outsides, and meet friends has fucking nothing at all to do with this thread.

X_X Go outside, meet some friends X_X
does he need to give you a reason? you were banned and banned for more than legimate reasons, and cry on the boards about your clearly childish and mind numbing decision making.
Maybe I wouldn't be crying on boards if you weren't telling me how to play the game.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Let the trolling begin!
Haha so funny smh
Well it's clear Riot is just going to continue fucking with me, and everyone here is going to continue fucking with me as well.

do you not see the one constant in this equation? its you. look how you acted, reacted and responded to people who dont agree with your point of view. and yes toxicity does lose games. if a player gets on tilt or upset and cant focus because of people like you they arent going to preform well. or they just might afk, feed, ect because of your behavior, which in its self isnt right, but some what justified. I just want to thank riot you got perma ban before the teamspeak/voice chat came on on the client. its a game, have fun, not all people are on the same skill level all the time, some times they are having a bad game or its a new champ or vs a champ they havent played. there  are so many variables but once again the only constant is you.

> [{quoted}](name=Ki11eraA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nfEOEHiN,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-06-27T22:38:49.145+0000)
>
> Well it's clear Riot is just going to continue fucking with me, and everyone here is going to continue fucking with me as well.

They arent gonna continue fucking with you. They are done with you.
Maybe if they we're done they would actually stop replying to me.

So you've got coarse language, death threats, rape threats, homophobia and racism. This is EXACTLY the kind of thing that gets you perma banned. Definitely deserved, the community is better off without this kind of behavior ruining games and you should seek professional help if you are saying these things to anyone.

You're joking, right? Plenty have been banned for much less than this.

> liss f

^ That's the only non-toxic comment in your entire chatlog. How do you not understand this?

If what you're saying might get you punched in real life, don't say it here either. This is completely unacceptable.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
yeah, i think you are ban worthy, you have the wrong mindset if you think you can talk like that to anybody and be in the right, you should feel ashamed.

Just a troll...
Move on...
If he's serious nothing we say can change that psycho mindset.
So move on...

> [{quoted}](name=SrbLud,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nfEOEHiN,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-06-27T22:41:11.226+0000)
>
> psycho mindset.

Psycho mindset? Please think about what you just said then come back. Posting comments online doesn't make me a god damn psychopath, and a troll seriously? Do you actually want to see the fucking permaban? http://prntscr.com/blw3nd
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Clearly you have nothing to backup what you just said, but post your unfunny memes Riot Games, Inc. provided for you.

You keep spitting salt while i play on my 3 healthy accounts.
You can 1v1 me if you want.
Oh...no wait...you can't...cause you got smited with a ban hammer for acting like a 12 year old kid and have no champs now.
Grow up and figure out your stuff.
If you're as toxic in real life you won't get far.
check the top part sir

At this point i'm bored and would like some drama.
Never back out of a fight you can't lose.
It's fun when they think they're right.
{{champion:33}} ok
Hi
ROFL ROFL ROFL ROFL TO Funny WTF DO U THINK PERMA'S were made for shit talkers like you
Is this.... A joke?

i dont think this alone got you perma banned but a history of being a complete toxic assclown has. after numerous reports of toxic behavior verbal abuse and hate speech you deserve the permaban. and thankfully riot did it. people like you really make the community a toxic environment for all. because you decided to be this way you ruined the game experience for at least 1 player (the one you were flaming) if not your team and if this is all chat all 9 players in game.
I'm honestly gonna thank you for posting what you actually think in this thread besides saying annoying shit most people do on here.
